articles.title: North America & Asia might collide to form the next supercontinent 'Amasia' on Earth - WION
articles.description: The Next supercontinent is in the making. Today, there are seven continents. Some 200 million years from now there will be just one. Geophysicist Ross Mitchell has recently unveiled in his new book 'The Next Supercontinent'. Watch this video to know more.
